N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 141-2.2 - Statement to employee

State Regulations

Every employer covered by this Part shall furnish to each
employee a statement with every payment of wages, listing hours worked, rates
paid, gross wages, allowances, if any, claimed as part of the minimum wage, deductions and net wages. In the case of janitors, the number of units shall be
recorded in the place of hours worked. Notes
